remarks: Move LHS left multiplication to RHS. (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 10-Jun-2020.)
statement:
mvllmulapd.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) $.
mvllmulapd.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) $.
mvllmulapd.3 $e |- ( ph -> A # 0 ) $.
mvllmulapd.4 $e |- ( ph -> ( A x. B ) = C ) $.
mvllmulapd $p |- ( ph -> B = ( C / A ) ) $.
